title: Frontend Engineer Intern
description: This is an excellent opportunity to be a part of the Token Metrics team as a Frontend Engineer Intern. This 3-month long unpaid internship will evaluate your skills in web design, user experience, web page optimization, and brand consistency, as well as your communication and interpersonal skills. Skills used includes ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS.
skills: ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS
